# Resource: honeycombio_marker_setting

Creates a marker setting.
For more information on marker settings, check out the [Marker Settings API](https://docs.honeycomb.io/api/marker-settings/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
variable "dataset" {
  type = string
}
resource "honeycombio_marker_setting" "deploy_marker" {
  type    =  "deploy"
  color   = "#DF4661"
  dataset = var.dataset
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `color` (String) The color set for the marker as a hex color code.
- `type` (String) The type of marker setting. (e.g. "deploy", "job-run")

### Optional

- `dataset` (String) The dataset this marker setting belongs to. If not set, it will be Environment-wide.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the marker setting was created.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the marker setting was last modified.
